caption.p:
Bivariate relationships between percent virus seed transmission and infection traits. Regressions considering data for both viruses together (A and B), only JPN1-TuMV (C to E), and only Fny-CMV (F to H) are shown. Linear relationships of percent virus seed transmission and speed of virus movement in centimeters per day (purple), virus multiplication in the inflorescence in nanograms of viral RNA per microgram of total RNA (orange), virulence as 1 âˆ’ ( SW i/SW m ) (light blue), and long-term seed survival as G 48
i / G 48
m (green) are represented.
